explains: n. 性欲；强烈欲望；（神学，被看作是罪过的）感官欲望
v. 有强烈的性欲；渴望

sentences.en: It was Fred's lust for glitz and glamour that was driving them apart.
sentences.cn: 弗雷德对浮华和美艳的欲望使他们分手。

sentences.en: All people, she said, lived their lives in bondage to hunger, pain and lust.
sentences.cn: 她说所有人都生活在饥饿、痛苦和欲望的束缚之中。

sentences.en: Your job is to just say no to laziness, lust, greed, drug use and the other sins.
sentences.cn: 你的工作就是对懒惰、欲望、贪婪、吸毒和其他罪恶说不。
